items: Start in a plank position with your hands on the medicine ball, shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body towards the ball by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Push back up to the starting position, using your chest and triceps to lift your body.
Roll the medicine ball to your other hand and repeat the push up.
Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.
Strengthens chest, shoulders, triceps, and core muscles
Improves upper body endurance and stability
Increases range of motion in shoulders
Engages multiple muscle groups for a full body workout
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
